column4: what command is executed while trying to enable visual effects? something goes wrong and it says:
Desktop Effects could not be enabled
I want to track the problem
what command is executed while trying to enable visual effects? something goes wrong and it says: Desktop effects could not be enabled. I want to trace the problem down.
it's Intel Corporation Mobile GM965/GL960 Integrated Graphics Controller
all right! it did a thing. I understand I can experience some problems though? where are effects configurable? things like cube and so on?
it's not installed by default, right?
The program 'ccsm' is currently not installed.  You can install it by typing... so it looks like it isn't.
anyway, thank you for your help.
